FILE: cm800850v11.0.txt
DYAD: INDONESIA-THAILAND

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170521
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170521

MID4 2002-2010:

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4560

TERRMID: MID4560 3 -- not territorial 
TERRMID-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES:

TERRLINK: MID4560 3 -- not third party linked to territorial dispute
TERRLINK-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID: MID4560 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4560 the maritime boundary was delimited between the two countries in a series of agreements in the 1970s. Boundary is fully settled, and MID4560 was Indonesia sinking Thai vessels allegedly illegally fishing in Indonesian waters. There is no evidence that the Thai government disputed that the vessels were in Indonesian waters. Indonesia regularly captures and sinks fishing vessels illegally fishing in Indonesian waters. See MID documentation for maritime delimitation treaties. 

ISLMID: MID4560 3 -- not islands
ISLMID-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID4560 no islands are disputed between the two countries, and their maritime boundary is delimited. MID4560 was an ilegal fishing incident. 

CIVWARMID: MID4560 3 -- not civil war
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4560 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID: MID4560 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4560 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4560 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:

MID4560
rivalry=800850 nationa=INDONESIA nationb=THAILAND MID4560 20040310-20040310 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

While investigating reports of Thai boats illegally fishing in Indonesian waters, the Indonesian military sank one of the Thai fishing boats after it opened fire on them. First day of dispute was on 3/10/2004 and last day of dispute was on 3/10/2004.

Sources: 

1971 Indonesia, Thailand maritime boundary agreement: http://www.un.org/depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/TREATIES/THA-IDN1971CS.PDF

1971 India, Indonesia, Malaysia maritime boundary agreements: https://www.state.gov/documents/organization/59574.pdf

1975 Indonesia, Thailand maritime boundary agreement: http://www.un.org/depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/TREATIES/THA-IDN1975SB.PDF
